data.text: Telebo nuiti undaa ɠa ʋilisu
Kɛlɛ ziilɛigi ɠa ʋaazu,
«Kɛlɛ wa ʋe de, à ʋaa lɛɛ ʋɛ, ungaiziɛ anzanui ná-dointi,
Ɓɛ ɠa wo ɲɛɛɠulazu su?
wɔiti wo ɠaazosu ga wo yiima vaiti daazeelilalai sɛne guluiti bu,
Kɔtu maaloungaiti ti pɛtugi zu, è ʋoluzeigiti kana,
È è-laazuʋɛ ɓɛtɛʋɛ gize ɠaaɠoozagiti maazu.
È ɗa-zalei lɔɔɠuʋɛ kpogi ʋoluʋɛ.
È lobɛanii leʋeni galagi Mɔlɔke ʋɔ,
È ɠaaɓaa ga è ziɛ ɠana,
Ɓɛ ɠa é ɠɛni è yiizoolɛzu,
Nà ʋaazu kulazu kɛlɛma ga è la ga sɔbalala nu ʋelei è ɠisiɛzu la,
Ɗa kpee loona, è wooɠula ti ma,
Toɠa ɠɛ ma:
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA é geezuʋɛ Anii-Pɛ-Unga,
Gè la yɛsu kpɔɛi laawu yeenɔpɛ,
Izilayɛle nuɓusɛi ná-ani wɔin ɲɔi zìiɠaawanani.
Gè ná-kɛɛwotii ɠwɛɛ, kɛlɛ nà kɛdɛsu,
Nà maamusɛ wuyei lɔ ti-la.
Nu ɲɔiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kpoloɗɛi é ɲiikpisu,
Nà-GALAGI ɠɛ:
